description:
A super-burly, binding for speed-loving skiers who are all about the downhill trip. They deliver high-end performance, solid climbing ability, and brakes that fit on wider skis. Stainless steel anti-friction glide plate is height adjustable and releases clean, unhindered by dirt, snow, and ice.

  • Lock and Walk Brake offer neutral position or climbing aid of 10 degrees
  • Anti-Ice Rail clears snow and ice from boots
  • Low stand height (24mm) aids power transmission
  • Base plate is quadruple secured with Auto Quad Lock technology
  • Adjustable Anti-friction gliding plate is made of stainless steel
  • Robust Hollow Linkage 2 step-in heel is suited for aggressive skiing
  • Sole ID technology id compatible with alpine, touring and GripWalk Boots
name: Marker Duke PT 12 Bindings
